dmca.title: [EV1-C2073787B] Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 11, 2006 2:55 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2073787B] Notice of Infringing Activity

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Notice of Infringing Activity
Added by system at Thursday, Dec 7 2006 11:57 pm
X-MailFrom: lava@1c.ru

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Dec 7 23:57:40 2006

DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Thu, 7 Dec 2006 23:56:26 -0600

with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Thu, 7 Dec 2006 23:56:25 -0600

(Spam Firewall) with ESMTP  id 5E4579248; Thu,  7 Dec 2006 23:56:19 -0600 (CST)

 (MDaemon PRO v9.5.3)
 with ESMTP id md50015282442.msg; 
        Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:56:02 +0300
From: =?koi8-r?B?7MHX0snOz9fBIOHOzsE=?= <lava@1c.ru>
To: <abuse@ev1servers.net>
Cc: <noc@ev1servers.net>, 
        <admin2@ev1servers.net>, 
        <ipadmin@ev1servers.net>
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Notice of Infringing Activity
Subject: Notice of Infringing Activity
Date: Fri, 8 Dec 2006 08:54:27 +0300
Message-ID: <000001c71a8d$522adc40$4501010a@LavrinovaPC>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="koi8-r" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11
Thread-Index: AccZ7RJmY5iqpxcoTM61++Du294SZwACaOLQACV5brA=
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2869
X-Spam-Processed: 1c.ru, Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:56:02 +0300 
        (not processed: message from valid local sender)
X-Return-Path: lava@1c.ru
X-Envelope-From: lava@1c.ru
X-MDAV-Processed: 1c.ru, Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:56:02 +0300
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 2.13
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=2.13 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0
QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED tests=DEAR_SOMETHING,
MIME_BASE64_TEXT
X-Barracuda-Spam-Report: Code version 3.02, rules version 3.0.28024 
        Rule breakdown below  pts rule name              description 
        ---- ---------------------- -------------------------------------------------- 
        1.61 DEAR_SOMETHING         BODY: Contains 'Dear (something)' 
        0.52 MIME_BASE64_TEXT       RAW: Message text disguised using base64 encoding 
Return-Path: lava@1c.ru
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Dec 2006 05:56:25.0909 (UTC) FILETIME=[98C4BE50:01C71A8D] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir or Madam 
 
1C Company hereby notifies you that it has received information from which it has a
good faith basis to believe that users of service http://www.buhinfo.com/, which
appear to be administered by your company's personnel, via links mentioned below are
offering infringing material or are engaged in other unauthorized activities
relating to copyrighted material for which 1C Company owns the copyright. 
  
Infringing materials were found at the following locations: 
http://www.buhinfo.com/file1C.php  
 
Statement of authority
1C copyrighted materials were made available from mentioned above locations without
authorization from the copyright owner or its agent. 
1C Company hereby gives a notice of these activities to you and requests that you
take expeditious action to remove or disable access to materials described above,
and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of these copyrighted
materials via your company's network. 
We request an immediate takedown of this links. 
The information in this notification is accurate. Please inform us what action you
take. 
   
   
 Sincerely,
 Anna Lavrinova,
 Lawyer
 1C Company 
   
 51, Malaya Gruzinskaya str., Moscow, 123056 box 64, Russia
 Tel.: +7(495) 681 73-81, fax: +7(495)681-78-08
 E-mail: lava@1c.ru
 www.1c.ru 
 
 
 
ä
